summary: Just a small addition to breezehome that adds all available crafting furniture including hearthfires.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#0d0e6e]This is my second mod.[/color]

[color=red]This is currently released Alpha mode. It's almost ready for Beta.

Required: All Official DLCs, and all decorations bought for breezehome, except the replacement of the alchemy lab with the orphan bedroom, anything besides all the decorations and what i have said i have not tested and do not know what would happen.[/color]

This mod adds an addition to breezehome, It will have an abundance of ore, ingots, ingredients, and a chest that will contain all the main enchantments, firewood, its mainly for having a good place for storing and getting the items you need.

if anyone finds a bug or two when it's released please feel free to either help me fix it or point it out! :) thanks in advance.
---------------------------------------
ChangeLog:

v1.0.0
[x] added addition
[x] fixed some problems
[x] added all crafting furniture
[x] added main door

v1.1.0

[x] Fixed Entrance
[x] Added chests and most of the items
[x] Added a Welcome Note
[x] Fixed The Door
[x] Added a Guard

v1.2.0

[x] Updated The Main Bedroom & Lydias Room
[x] Made Some Improvements In The Decorations
[x] Fixed The Guards Voice
[x] Decorated The Storage Room With A Couple Weapon Racks And Some Weapons
[x] Fixed A Few Navmesh issues
--------------------------------------------
[TBA] fix all issues
[TBA] update quality
[TBA] add an optional mod that contains a door in the addition that reaches the first entrance of the grey palace and a key to a secret area within the grey palace that will have a mini-boss and notable loot
[TBA] add the chest with all the main enchantments in weapons
[TBA] figure out how to make an exterior shell for the addition and add it to whiterun
----------------------------------------------------
[color=red]Dev Note: i'm needing help with the navmesh cause my ck only allows me to do the minimum, and debugging.[/color]
author: GhostTech
